definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Do your kids still believe in Santa Claus?
sentences.chinese: 你的孩子还相信有圣诞老人吗？

sentences.english: Recently a plastic Santa Claus was ripped off a door.
sentences.chinese: 最近，一个塑料圣诞老人被人从门上撕掉了。

sentences.english: Marty: He says Santa is too fat to come down our Chimney.
sentences.chinese: 他说圣诞老人太胖了，下不来我们的烟囱。

sentences.english: Hot little helper you got here, huh, Santa?
sentences.chinese: 热心的小帮手，来这里，圣诞老人？

sentences.english: He wants to be a Santa. Look! He forgot to wear the clothes.
sentences.chinese: 老大一定要当圣诞老人，抢了帽子却忘了穿衣服。

sentences.english: Yes, sweet heart, Santa is going give you the present. The tooth fairy is gonna come here.
sentences.chinese: 是的宝贝，圣诞老人会给你带礼物，牙仙也会来。

sentences.english: Santa shouted out the reindeers' names and cracked his whip.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞老人喊出驯鹿的名字，猛抽他的鞭子。

sentences.english: Santa is also known as the Swag Man.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞老人被认为是流浪汉。

sentences.english: Software Description: About Santa's Arrival, Santa weathers out a snowstorm as he makes every effort to deliver toys on Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞老人在天气变化暴风雪努力在圣诞夜给予玩具。

sentences.english: There was also a Santa Claus, dressed in his traditional red robe with white trim.
sentences.chinese: 它旁边还有一个穿着一贯的白边红袍子的圣诞老人像。

sentences.english: But today’s chubby Santa is not about giving to the poor.
sentences.chinese: 但是今天胖乎乎的圣诞老人不会给穷人孩子礼物。

sentences.english: Why are there always no gifts in my stockings hanging outside.
sentences.chinese: 袜子挂在外面老收不到圣诞老人的礼物咋回事？

sentences.english: It was my turn to be Santa Claus at the kids’ school.
sentences.chinese: 终于有机会在孩子们的学校里当了一次圣诞老人。

sentences.english: They want Santa Claus to put presents in their stockings.
sentences.chinese: 他们想让圣诞老人在他们的长统袜里放礼物。

sentences.english: Shanta would rather have flown on without stopping , but the law was the law.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞老人宁愿不断的飞行不会停下但是法律就是法律。

definition: Père David's deer (Elaphurus davidianus), species of deer native to China that is critically endangered
Winnie-the-Pooh (bear character in children's stories by A. A. Milne adapted by Disney)
